items.name: Message Type
items.comment: This Data Item allows for a more convenient handling of the messages at the receiver side by further defining the type of transaction.

data_fields.name: Message Type
data_fields.comment:
1 Alive Message
2 Route Adherence Monitor Longitudinal Deviation
3 Route Adherence Monitor Heading Deviation
4 Minimum Safe Altitude Warning
5 Area Proximity Warning
6 Clearance Level Adherence Monitor
7 Short Term Conflict Alert
8 Approach Funnel Deviation Alert
9 RIMCAS Arrival / Landing Monitor (ALM)
10 RIMCAS Arrival / Departure Wrong Runway Alert (WRA)
11 RIMCAS Arrival / Departure Opposite Traffic Alert (OTA)
12 RIMCAS Departure Monitor (RDM)
13 RIMCAS Runway / Taxiway Crossing Monitor (RCM)
14 RIMCAS Taxiway Separation Monitor (TSM)
15 RIMCAS Unauthorized Taxiway Movement Monitor(UTMM)
16 RIMCAS Stop Bar Overrun Alert (SBOA)
17 End Of Conflict (EOC)

items.name: Data Source Identifier
items.comment: Identification of the system sending the data

data_fields.name: SAC
data_fields.comment: System Area Code

data_fields.name: SIC
data_fields.comment: System Identification Code

items.name: SDPS Identifier
items.comment: Identification of the SDPS providing data to the safety nets server.

items.name: Time of Message
items.comment: Absolute time stamping of the message in the form of elapsed time since last midnight

items.name: Track Number 1
items.comment: Identification of a track number related to conflict

data_fields.name: Track Number 1
data_fields.comment: range: 0 to 65535

items.name: Track Number 2
items.comment: Together with I004/030, this item defines the track pair in conflict.

data_fields.name: Track Number 2
data_fields.comment: range: 0 to 65535

data_fields.name: Alert Identifier
data_fields.comment: range: 0 to 65535

items.name: Alert Status
items.comment: Information concerning status of the alert

items.name: Safety Net Function & System Status
items.comment: Status of the Safety Nets functions handled by the system

data_fields.name: Safety Net Function & System Status First Extent

items.name: Conflict Timing and Separation
items.comment: Information on Timing and Aircraft Separation

data_fields.name: Current Horizontal Separation
data_fields.comment: unit: metres

data_fields.name: Estimated minimum horizontal separation
data_fields.comment: unit: metres

data_fields.name: Current Vertical Separation
data_fields.comment: unit: feet

data_fields.name: Estimated minimum vertical separation
data_fields.comment: unit: feet

items.name: Longitudinal Deviation
items.comment: Longitudinal deviation for Route Adherence Monitoring, in two’s complement form.

data_fields.name: Longitudinal deviation
data_fields.comment: unit: metres

items.name: Transversal Distance Deviation
items.comment: Transversal distance deviation for Route Adherence Monitoring, in two’s complement form.

data_fields.name: Transversal Distance Deviation
data_fields.comment: unit: metres

items.name: Vertical Deviation
items.comment: Vertical Deviation from planned altitude, in two’s complement form.

data_fields.name: Vertical deviation
data_fields.comment: unit: feet

items.name: Area Definition
items.comment: Definition of Areas involved in a Safety Net Alert

items.name: AN
items.comment: Name of the area involved in an APW alarm

data_fields.name: Crossing Area Name
data_fields.comment: Name of Crossing Area Involved in a RIMCA

data_fields.name: Runway/Taxiway Designator 1
data_fields.comment: Designator of Runway/Taxiway 1 Involved in a RIMCA

data_fields.name: Runway/Taxiway Designator 2
data_fields.comment: Designator of Runway/Taxiway 2 Involved in a RIMCA

data_fields.name: Stop Bar Designator
data_fields.comment: Designator of Stop-Bar Involved in a RIMCA

data_fields.name: Gate Designator
data_fields.comment: Gate Designator (in 7 characters) of the approaching aircraft in a RIMCA

items.name: FDPS Sector Control Identification
items.comment: Identification of a list of FDPS Sector Control Positions in charge of the involved targets, as provided by the FDPS

items.name: MAS
items.comment:
Conflict location in military airspace
0 conflict not predicted to occur in military airspace
1 conflict predicted to occur in military airspace

items.name: CAS
items.comment:
Conflict location in civil airspace
0 conflict not predicted to occur in civil airspace
1 conflict predicted to occur in civil airspace

items.name: FLD
items.comment:
Fast lateral divergence
0 Aircraft are not fast diverging laterally at current time
1 Aircraft are fast diverging laterally at current time

items.name: FVD
items.comment:
Fast vertical divergence
0 Aircraft are not fast diverging vertically at current time
1 Aircraft are fast diverging vertically at current time

items.name: Type
items.comment:
Type of separation infringement
0 Minor separation infringement
1 Major separation infringement

items.name: Cross
items.comment:
Crossing test
0 Aircraft have not crossed at starting time of conflict
1 Aircraft have crossed at starting time of conflict

items.name: Div
items.comment:
Divergence test
0 Aircraft are not diverging at starting time of conflict
1 Aircraft are diverging at starting time of conflict

items.name: RRC
items.comment:
Runway/Runway crossing in RIMCAS
0 Default
1 Runway/Runway Crossing

items.name: RTC
items.comment:
Runway/Taxiway Crossing in RIMCAS
0 Default
1 Runway/Taxiway Crossing

items.name: Table Id
items.comment: Identification of conflict categories definition table

data_fields.name: Probability
data_fields.comment: Conflict probability (%)

data_fields.name: Duration
data_fields.comment: The duration of the conflict is the elapsed time since the declaration of the conflict

items.name: Aircraft Identification & Characteristics 1
items.comment: Identification & Characteristics of Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict.

data_fields.name: Aircraft Identifier #1
data_fields.comment: Aircraft Identifier (in 7 characters) of Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict

data_fields.name: Latitude #1
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

data_fields.name: Longitude #1
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -180 <= longitude < 180 deg.

data_fields.name: Altitude #1
data_fields.comment: Altitude of predicted conflict in two’s complement. Range -15FL <= Altitude <= 1500FL

data_fields.name: X-position #1
data_fields.comment: Starting X-Position of Conflict. unit: metres

data_fields.name: Y-Position #1
data_fields.comment: Starting Y-Position of Conflict. unit: metres

data_fields.name: Z-Position #1
data_fields.comment: Starting Z-Position of Conflict. unit: feet

data_fields.name: TIME TO THRESHOLD #1
data_fields.comment: Time to runway threshold for first approaching aircraft in a RIMCA

data_fields.name: Distance to Threshold #1
data_fields.comment: Distance from threshold for Aircraft 1 involved in a RIMCA. unit: metres

items.name: GAT/OAT #1
items.comment:
00 Unknown
01 General Air Traffic
10 Operational Air Traffic
11 Not applicable

items.name: FR1/FR2 #1
items.comment:
00 Instrument Flight Rules
01 Visual Flight rules
10 Not applicable
11 Controlled Visual Flight Rules

items.name: HPR #1
items.comment:
0 Normal Priority Flight
1 High Priority Flight

items.name: CDM #1
items.comment:
Climbing/Descending mode
00 Maintaining
01 Climbing
10 Descending
11 Invalid

data_fields.name: Mode S Identifier Aircraft #1
data_fields.comment: Aircraft Identification downloaded from Aircraft 1 involved in the Conflict if equipped with a Mode-S transponder.

data_fields.name: Flight Plan Number Aircraft #1
data_fields.comment: Number of the Flight Plan Correlated to Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict

data_fields.name: CFL #1
data_fields.comment: Cleared Flight Level for Aircraft 1 Involved in the Conflict. unit: FL

items.name: Aircraft Identification & Characteristics 2
items.comment: Identification & Characteristics of Aircraft 2 Involved in the Conflict.

data_fields.name: Aircraft Identifier #2
data_fields.comment: Aircraft Identifier (in 7 characters) of Aircraft 2 Involved in the Conflict

data_fields.name: Latitude #2
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -90 <= latitude <= 90 deg.

data_fields.name: Longitude #2
data_fields.comment: In WGS.84 in two’s complement. Range -180 <= longitude < 180 deg.

data_fields.name: Altitude #2
data_fields.comment: Altitude of predicted conflict in two’s complement. Range -15FL <= Altitude <= 1500FL

data_fields.name: X-position #2
data_fields.comment: Starting X-Position of Conflict. unit: metres

data_fields.name: Y-Position #2
data_fields.comment: Starting Y-Position of Conflict. unit: metres

data_fields.name: Z-Position #2
data_fields.comment: Starting Z-Position of Conflict. unit: feet

data_fields.name: TIME TO THRESHOLD #2
data_fields.comment: Time to runway threshold for first approaching aircraft in a RIMCA

data_fields.name: Distance to Threshold #2
data_fields.comment: Distance from threshold for Aircraft 2 involved in a RIMCA. unit: metres

items.name: GAT/OAT #2
items.comment:
00 Unknown
01 General Air Traffic
10 Operational Air Traffic
11 Not applicable

items.name: FR1/FR2 #2
items.comment:
00 Instrument Flight Rules
01 Visual Flight rules
10 Not applicable
11 Controlled Visual Flight Rules

items.name: HPR #2
items.comment:
0 Normal Priority Flight
1 High Priority Flight

items.name: CDM #2
items.comment:
Climbing/Descending mode
00 Maintaining
01 Climbing
10 Descending
11 Invalid

data_fields.name: Mode S Identifier Aircraft #2
data_fields.comment: Aircraft Identification downloaded from Aircraft 2 involved in the Conflict if equipped with a Mode-S transponder.

data_fields.name: Flight Plan Number Aircraft #2
data_fields.comment: Number of the Flight Plan Correlated to Aircraft 2 Involved in the Conflict

data_fields.name: CFL #2
data_fields.comment: Cleared Flight Level for Aircraft 2 Involved in the Conflict. unit: FL
